title: Islam to Atheism, Troubled by Canada's Woke New Religion
description:
Obaid Omer emigrated from India to Canada in the 70s as a boy with his parents. He gave up the Islamic faith as a tween, got an education and eventually worked overseas for his early adult life working in a variety of war torn places. When he returned to Canada the country in his words he didn't recognize his country. It went from Martin Luther King Jr's standard of judging people on the content of their character to judging them on the color of their skin.

He told a lot of his story to Andrea https://youtu.be/HLfZ40B810w
Obaid's Podcast. https://soundcloud.com/obaid-omer/tracks
You can find him on Twitter https://twitter.com/obaidomer
